thread.title: Peter Dinklage Up for Role in Avengers: Infinity War
thread.title_full: Peter Dinklage Up for Role in Avengers: Infinity War

author: Alex Gilyadov
title: Peter Dinklage Up for Role in Avengers: Infinity War
text:
Peter Dinklage, who plays Tyrion Lannister in Game of Thrones, is reportedly up for a role in Avengers: Infinity War. 
Variety reports that Dinklage is in talks to join the upcoming Marvel film's cast, though there isn't any information about what character the actor would play if he does. The seventh season of Game of Thrones recently wrapped production, and the show's move from a summer to fall shoot has allowed Dinklage to potentially star in Infinity War, which is set to begin shooting this summer in Scotland. The next two Avengers movies will be filmed back-to-back and Dinklage is expected to appear in both, according to Variety. 
Continue readingâ€¦
